mapper.select: SELECT a.name as name, sum(exercise_time) As total FROM ( select e.user_seq, e.exercise_time, e.exercise_date, u.name from tb_stat_exercise e inner join tb_user u on e.user_seq = u.user_seq where exercise_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} ) a group by a.name order by total desc

SELECT user_seq, (current_weight - goal_weight) AS total FROM tb_stat_weight WHERE (user_seq, TO_CHAR (weight_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) IN ( SELECT user_seq, TO_CHAR (MAX (weight_date), 'yyyy-mm-dd') total FROM tb_stat_weight WHERE weight_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY user_seq) ORDER BY total
